## Libraries

```{r}
install_if_missing <- function(packages) {
  # Loop through each package in the input list
  for (pkg in packages) {
    # Check if the package is installed
    if (!requireNamespace(pkg, quietly = TRUE)) {
      # If not installed, install the package
      install.packages(pkg)
    }
  }
}

# List of packages to check and install if missing
packages <- c("auk", "lubridate", "sf", "dggridR", "unmarked",
              "raster", "ebirdst", "MuMIn", "AICcmodavg", "fields", "tidyverse")

# Call the function with the list of packages
install_if_missing(packages)

# Load the libraries (optional step)
lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)

# resolve namespace conflicts
select <- dplyr::select
projection <- raster::projection

```
